name: skynet-web-extension
description: source code for the full skynet web extension

scripts.lint: npm run deps && npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.compile-b: npm run compile-a && npm run rollup-a
scripts.compile-c: npm run compile-b && npm run rollup-b
scripts.compile-d: npm run compile-c && npm run rollup-c
scripts.dist-b: npm run dist-a && mv build/bootloader.r.js dist/bootloader.js
scripts.dist-c: npm run dist-b && mv build/bridge.r.js dist/bridge.js
scripts.dist-d: npm run dist-c && cp assets/icon.png dist/icon.png
scripts.dist-e: npm run dist-d && cp assets/icon@2x.png dist/icon@2x.png
scripts.dist-f: npm run dist-e && cp assets/manifest.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build: npm run compile-d && npm run dist-f

author: David Vorick
